questionTitle: We wonder if we have to pay for the ............... cups and dishes.
He had the barber .................. his hair.
All the students but Teddy ........ present last Sunday.
How long ago .................. to her office?
All the butter ................ in the freezer.
Ann won't be late for work, .................. she?
My children ............. many photographs while we were on our vacation.
Twice four is ............ half of eighteen.
The time ......... he'll start is not known.
Yesterday, they ................ their exercises all the evening.
That old woman is ........ deaf to hear what her children say.
He painted his house ....... my house.
I won't blame my daughter for ............. the money because she is so young.
If today ........... Sunday, they would go to the beach.
I want to have my house .................
